sch:rule.sch:assert: Behavior Mechanism Objects must have an inline Datastream representing a Datastream Binding Spec (element amdSec with ID="DSBIND" must exist when element mets has TYPE="FedoraBMechObject"
Behavior Mechanism Objects must have an inline Datastream representing WSDL service bindings (element amdSec with ID="WSDL" must exist when element mets has TYPE="FedoraBMechObject"
Behavior Definition Objects must have an inline Datastream representing WSDL abstract method defs (element amdSec with ID="WSDL" must exist when element mets has TYPE="FedoraBDefObject"
Object must be of type "FedoraObject|FedoraBDefObject|FedoraBMechObject" (element mets: TYPE)
All Datastreams must have a DatastreamID (element fileGrp: ID is missing or empty)
Datastreams section encoding error (element fileSec: must have child fileGrp whose ID is "DATASTREAMS"
Datastreams section encoding error (element fileSec: can only have one fileGrp as direct decendant)
Every Datastream must have a DatastreamID (element fileGrp: ID is missing)
Datastream control group must be recorded (element file: OWNERID missing or empty)
Datastream control group must be "P" for Protected-External-Ref, "E" for External-Ref, "M" for Managed-Internal, or "X" for Inline-XML-User-Metadata. (element file: OWNERID)
Every Disseminator must have a DisseminatorID (element behaviorSec: GROUPID is missing or empty)
Disseminator must point to a Behavior Definition Object (element behaviorSec/interfaceDef: xlink:href is missing or empty)
Disseminator must point to a Behavior Mechanism Object (element behaviorSec/mechanism: xlink:href is missing or empty)
Object must have a date of creation (element header: CREATEDATE missing)
Datastream state must be recorded (element file: STATUS missing or empty)
Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element file: STATUS)
Disseminator must have a date of creation (element behaviorSec: CREATED missing)
Disseminator state must be recorded (element behaviorSec: STATUS missing or empty)
Disseminator state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element behaviorSec: STATUS)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element dmdSec: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be recorded (element dmdSec: STATUS missing or empty)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element dmdSec: STATUS)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element techMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be recorded (element techMD: STATUS missing or empty)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element techMD: STATUS)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element rightsMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be recorded (element rightsMD: STATUS missing or empty)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element rightsMD: STATUS)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element sourceMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be recorded (element sourceMD: STATUS missing or empty)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element sourceMD: STATUS)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element digiprovMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be recorded (element digiprovMD: STATUS missing or empty)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element digiprovMD: STATUS)
